nodes.text: Roron Corobb was a male Ithorian Jedi who, alongside the Togruta Jedi Master Shaak Ti and a clone task force, helped to protect Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine from Separatist General Grievous when Grievous stormed Galactic City in an attempt to kidnap Palpatine during the Battle of Coruscant. Grievous cut through Republic and Jedi security, including Corobb, killing him. Corobb had black eyes and light orange-brown skin, wore dark Jedi robes, and was equipped with a lightsaber that emitted a green blade.

Roron Corobb was first mentioned and pictured in the canon 2018 reference book Star Wars Lightsabers: A Guide to Weapons of the Force, written by Pablo Hidalgo. Corobb had previously appeared in Star Wars Legends in the 2003 TV series Star Wars: Clone Wars.
